tool_description: Determines optimal posting times and creates scheduling recommendations based on audience activity patterns and platform algorithms.

audience_demographics.description: Primary audience description including age, profession, and lifestyle

posting_frequency.description: Desired frequency: daily, every_other_day, three_times_week, weekly, or custom

avoid_times.description: Time ranges to avoid in HH:MM-HH:MM format

priority_days.description: Preferred days of week for posting

campaign_duration_days.description: Number of days to create schedule for (7-90)

error_messages: Invalid target platforms: Use platforms from [instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok]
Invalid timezone: Provide valid timezone identifier
Invalid posting frequency: Use one of [daily, every_other_day, three_times_week, weekly, custom]
Invalid campaign duration: Must be between 7 and 90 days
Invalid time format in avoid_times: Use HH:MM-HH:MM format
Invalid priority days: Use day names like Monday, Tuesday, etc.
usage: Specify target platforms, timezone, audience demographics, posting frequency, and content types. Optionally set time restrictions, priority days, and campaign duration. Returns optimal posting schedule with timestamps.

optimal_times.description: Recommended posting times in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM format

platform_assignments.description: Platform for each scheduled time slot

content_type_suggestions.description: Recommended content type for each time slot

engagement_predictions.description: Expected engagement level for each time slot: high, medium, or low

schedule_summary.description: Overview of the complete posting schedule strategy
